description: The interior ministry says officers came under attack as protests erupted for a third night.
title: Belarus election: Police use live fire on protesters in Brest
title_page: Belarus election: Police use live fire on protesters in Brest - BBC News
maintext: Earlier, our BBC team was also attacked by men dressed in black who appeared to be security forces. "Take the camera away," they shouted as they approached us. We showed them our government-issued accreditation, but one of the officers ripped our colleague's card from around her neck, took her camera and attempted to break it.
